languages.text: "В напоминание всему народу о смирении и верности нашем следующий цикл службы во всех храмах протектората фон Валанциус будут проводиться беспрерывно! Всякому подданному надлежит посетить их и вознести молитву во благодарение Богу-Императору. Храните веру и славьте набожного Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Чтобы показать чистоту и силу своей веры, Вольный торговец приказал устроить массовый молебен! Восславем же Императора!

languages.text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "В напоминание всему народу о смирении и верности нашем следующий цикл службы во всех храмах протектората фон Валанциус будут проводиться беспрерывно! Всякому подданному надлежит посетить их и вознести молитву во благодарение Богу-Императору. Храните веру и славьте набожного Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius trade empire will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

"To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: “为了提醒人们保持谦逊与忠诚，在下个周期内，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝境内所有神殿的祭祀活动都将不间断地举行！每位臣民都需要参加祭祀活动，向神皇献上感恩的祈祷。要保持信仰，赞美虔诚的行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “为了提醒人们保持谦逊与忠诚，在下个周期内，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝境内所有神殿的祭祀活动都将不间断地举行！每位臣民都需要参加祭祀活动，向神皇献上感恩的祈祷。要保持信仰，赞美虔诚的行商浪人！”

languages.text: «Para recordar a la gente la necesidad de humildad y lealtad, ¡durante todo un ciclo los servicios en todos los templos del protectorado von Valancius se celebrarán sin interrupciones! Todos sus súbditos deberán asistir a los servicios y ofrecer una oración de gratitud al Dios Emperador. ¡Por la defensa de la fe y por la piedad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «Para recordar a la gente la necesidad de humildad y lealtad, ¡durante todo un ciclo los servicios en todos los templos del protectorado von Valancius se celebrarán sin interrupciones! Todos sus súbditos deberán asistir a los servicios y ofrecer una oración de gratitud al Dios Emperador. ¡Por la defensa de la fe y por la piedad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: 「民に謙虚さと忠誠心を思い出させるために、次のサイクルではフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領内のすべての神殿で、奉仕が止まることなく行われる！臣民は全員礼拝に訪れ、神帝陛下に感謝の祈りをささげるのだ。信仰を守る、立派な自由開拓者を称賛せよ！」
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「民に謙虚さと忠誠心を思い出させるために、次のサイクルではフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領内のすべての神殿で、奉仕が止まることなく行われる！臣民は全員礼拝に訪れ、神帝陛下に感謝の祈りをささげるのだ。信仰を守る、立派な自由開拓者を称賛せよ！」

languages.text: "Um die Leute an ihre Demut und Loyalität zu erinnern, werden die religiösen Dienste in allen Tempeln des Protektorats von Valancius im nächsten Zyklus ohne Unterbrechung durchgeführt! Jeder Untertan muss eine Messe besuchen und dem Gottimperator ein Dankesgebet darbringen. Bleibt stark im Glauben und preist {mf|den frommen Freihändler|die fromme Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Um die Leute an ihre Demut und Loyalität zu erinnern, werden die religiösen Dienste in allen Tempeln des Protektorats von Valancius im nächsten Zyklus ohne Unterbrechung durchgeführt! Jeder Untertan muss eine Messe besuchen und dem Gottimperator ein Dankesgebet darbringen. Bleibt stark im Glauben und preist {mf|den frommen Freihändler|die fromme Freihändlerin}!

languages.text: « Pour rappeler au peuple son humilité et sa loyauté, pendant le prochain cycle, les services s'enchaîneront sans interruption dans tous les temples du protectorat von Valancius ! Tous les sujets doivent assister à un service et offrir une prière de gratitude à l'Empereur-Dieu. Gardez la foi et louez {mf|le pieux libre-marchand|la pieuse libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « Pour rappeler au peuple son humilité et sa loyauté, pendant le prochain cycle, les services s'enchaîneront sans interruption dans tous les temples du protectorat von Valancius ! Tous les sujets doivent assister à un service et offrir une prière de gratitude à l'Empereur-Dieu. Gardez la foi et louez {mf|le pieux libre-marchand|la pieuse libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "İnsanlara tevazu ve sadakatlerinin hatırlatılması amacıyla, bir sonraki döngü boyunca von Valancius protektorasındaki tüm tapınaklarda kesintisiz dinî hizmet verilecek, ayinler yapılacaktır! Tüm tebaanın bir ayine katılması ve Tanrı İmparator'a şükran duaları etmesi zorunludur. İnancınızı güçlü tutun ve takva sahibi Hür Tacir'in adını yüceltin!"
languages.original_text: "To remind the people of their humility and loyalty, for the next cycle, ministration in all temples in the von Valancius protectorate will be performed without interruption! Every subject is to attend a service and offer a prayer of gratitude to the God-Emperor. Keep the faith and praise the pious Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlara tevazu ve sadakatlerinin hatırlatılması amacıyla, bir sonraki döngü boyunca von Valancius protektorasındaki tüm tapınaklarda kesintisiz dinî hizmet verilecek, ayinler yapılacaktır! Tüm tebaaların bir ayine katılması ve Tanrı İmparator'a şükran duaları etmesi zorunludur. İnancınızı güçlü tutun ve takva sahibi Hür Tacir'in adını yüceltin!"
